general_advisory: Overall crop condition is normal. To control foot rot disease in paddy spray Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64% WP. Harvest matured crops like vegetables & pulses. Deworming and vaccination against Foot and Mouth Disease and Brucellosis should be advised in animals. Vegetable seedlings should be transplanted in afternoon hours. Termites may damage crops and vegetables, farmers are advised to spray Chlorpyriphos 20 EC.

advisory: False smut: Spray Propiconazole or Hexaconazole @ 100 ml or Copper oxychloride @ 250 g in 200 lt of water per acre.
Neck Blast: Drain out excess water from the paddy field. Spray Hexaconazole @ 400 ml/acre or Azoxystrobin + Difenoconazole @ 200 ml/acre.
Pod Borer Management: To manage Bihar hairy caterpillar, spray Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG @ 80 ml/acre or Profenophos 50% EC @ 400 ml/acre.
Pod Borer Management: To manage Bihar hairy caterpillar, spray Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG @ 80 ml/acre or Profenophos 50% EC @ 400 ml/acre.
Pre-sowing stage: Seed treatment should be done with Carbendazim 50% WP @ 2 g/kg of seeds.
Fruiting and Harvesting: To manage Fruit flies infestation, spray Malathion @ 1 ml/lt.
Flowering/Fruiting: To reduce Phomopsis blight disease, spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb Zineb 75% WP @ 500 g/acre in 200 litres of water.
